Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/16/1987 to a 2-year deal worth $782,000 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/1988, off Alejandro Pena (SD)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/26/1988, off Danny Cox (STL)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1989, hitting .349 with 5 HR, 19 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against San Diego on 7/15/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/1989, hitting .563 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 1989, hitting .333 with 20 HR, 102 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/1990, hitting .455 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,550,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,550,000 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Chicago to Toronto on 2/2/1992 (Going to CHC: P Orel Hershiser. Going to TOR: P Jeff Fassero, 1B Mark Grace)...
6/9/1992: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $3,590,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1992...
